full_summary:
# New Articulated Buoy Crane 12.5 MT CCGS Judy LaMarsh
===========
## Tender Summary

* **Reference Number**: PW-__MD-021-28935
* **Solicitation Number**: F7044-221040/A
* **Tender Closing Date**: 21 March 2023, 2:00 PM Eastern Daylight Savings Time (EDST)

## Procurement Overview

The Canadian Coast Guard (CCG) requires a new articulated deck crane for its CCGS Judy LaMarsh vessel, with a maximum working load (SWL) of 12.5 MT. The procurement is subject to the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP) and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

## Procurement Description

The CCGS Judy LaMarsh is in need of a new articulated marine buoy handling crane package, including control systems, power supplies, and defined accessories. This package must meet the requirements outlined in the Statement of Work - Annex "A". The procurement strategy is open to all interested suppliers, and the lowest priced compliant bid will be recommended for award.

## Tender Documents

* A downloadable document package is available on the Canada Buys website.
* Tender documents may be submitted in either English or French.

## Contract Requirements

* Contracting entity: Public Works and Government Services Canada
* Address: 11 Laurier Street, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5
* End user: Fisheries and Oceans Canada
* Contract terms: delivery date and payment terms to be negotiated

## Contact Information

* Dan Byron, Contract Manager
* Phone: (613) 854-0393
* Email: dan.byron@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Please note that this tender is now closed**. However, if you are looking for similar tenders, I would recommend checking the official Canada Tenders website for the latest listings.
